Thank you, crack works fine! It may be confusing to unexperienced users what is meant with "installation folder". When you run the installation program, it will ask where to store the program files, which is normally in C:/Program files (or another folder with the folder name in your national language).
When finishing installation, be sure to TAKE AWAY THE X in "Run/Launch application". Otherwise it will start without being registered.
Go to desktop (or Start menu) open "My computer", open folder "Program files". Here are the files for all your installed programs. Open the folder called 'AVS4YOU'. THIS IS THE "Installation folder" for this program. 
Open the folder called "Crack" in your downloaded material. Copy the file inside, called 'AVSVideoConverter.exe' into the "installation folder" just described. THEN doubleclick this file when it is inside the installation folder. This action will perform the registration for you and probably start the program. If not, start it from the shortcut created on your desktop.
This is how most cracks work. Some demand that the program runs before the crack is performed.

Sorry: The file inside the "Crack" folder should be moved into the folder called 'AVSVideoConverter6' inside the installation folder, and replace the file already there. Then, this "registered" version of the program should start even if a shortcut is already created on your desktop.
These procedures always vary a little, so this time even I was confused. The file inside the "crack" folder is the main program file with a registration already performed.

The menu function wont come up on mine

Many many thanks to Kuthumi for the instructions. I had a bit of a variance so will modify Kuthumi?s instructions in the hope it may help someone else.

I installed the program 4 times & uninstalled the loaded program each time before reinstalling. I found on the second uninstall that files were left in the Registry & a folder was left in Program Files. I went in & deleted these as I think they left remnants that may have caused the program to reinstall as an unregistered version each time i.e. when I loaded it the first time it registered as an unregistered version & the remnants were causing the program to reinstall as an unregistered version on each subsequent reinstallation. Also, I got caught using an icon that was left on the desktop, it wanted to take me in to register even though I had the registered version working, so delete any icons on your desktop before reinstalling.

All menu items are working & I just converted & burnt an MKV video file that I couldn?t convert with ConvertX so I am as happy as a pig in mud & I am a real novice at this stuff.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
I installed as below:

When you run the installation program, which is included in the download & is titled ?AVSVideoConverter Application 44,562kb?, it will ask where to store the program files, which is normally in ?C:/Program files?.

When finishing installation, be sure to TAKE AWAY THE ?X? in "Run/Launch application" ? (OR in my case I unticked the ?Run Launch Application? & then when it tried to access the net I quickly clicked the ?X? to stop it doing this,) - otherwise it will start without being registered.

Go to desktop (or Start menu) open "My computer/ C Drive?, open folder "Program Files". Here are the files for all your installed programs. Open the folder called ?AVS4YOU?. Open the folder called ?AVSVideoConverter6? & delete the Application called ?AVSVideoConverter Application 10,683kb?

Open the folder called "Crack" in your downloaded material. Copy the Cracked file inside, called ?AVSVideoConverter Application 10,683kb? into the folder titled ?AVSVideoConverter6? - where you just deleted the other Application from. The insertion of the Cracked application will register the program.

THEN doubleclick this file when it is inside the installation folder. This action will perform the registration for you and probably start the program. If not, start it from the shortcut created on your desktop.

This is how most cracks work. Some demand that the program runs before the crack is performed.
